website_summaries.verdict: Turns 360-degrees to pick up every angle in the bathroom.
pros: Adhesive, yet is also easily removed and placed elsewhere depending on where you need it
Withstands even extremely hot showers and holds true to its fogless claim
High marks for the overall quality of the product at an attractive price
cons: Basic mirror without the bells and whistles, but does its job

customer_reviews.title: Look at video on Amazon before installing
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this one day, so I do not know how long it will remain fog free. I do know that it survived falling off of the wall twice before I figured out how to install the suction cup. The written installation instructions are poor — watch the video on Amazon instead. Use all of your strength when rotating the base (NOT the mirror) to afix the suction cup to the wall. I suggest installing the base high and then positioning the mirror at a slight downward angle to keep it free of shower spray.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: This will not stay on wall.....I wish it had
customer_reviews.text: I wish this worked out but it just will not stay on the wall. I have a smooth tile shower. Interestingly, when you hang this and lock it on as directed, it feels so sturdy on the wall that you could hang from it. However, it would not stay. It Lasted just one day on two occasions, then it lasted three days, and then it lasted four days and when it fell the fourth time it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s an amazing product as I need it everyday while having shower. it does everything it promises to do, Yes its “fog free” its also very easy to install by simply twisting it to lock and unlock and with this sturdy base suction cup it will never come off the wall without you releasing it. It can move around the mirror 360 degree that makes you a lot easier to do your work. Highly recommend NO FOG Mirror.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Tricky Mounting, but nice Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I knew my textured tiles would probably be a problem. I used some 3M 5952 double-back tape to attach a CD to the wall (covered the hole w/ tape too) and attached the mirror to that. With a smooth surface, the suction cup is very strong. So far, the mirror has worked well, even in my scalding hot showers. I wish the razor holder were just a little deeper, as it tends to be easily bumped off, but otherwise, I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Glowacki

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror did not live up to expectations! Within 2 weeks the mirror had built up humidity stains and I was unable to use to shave. And even when following the care instructions - do not hang in/near water flow, do not wipe or clean with cloth, use toothpaste and finger if you do need to clean - the mirror still gets foggy and unusable during the course of a shower. I have to repeatedly splash "shampoo water" and then rinse (again per care instructions) and I'm lucky if I can finish shaving before it fogs up again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Eventually starts fogging up within 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product and it has not fogged up within the first few weeks. Now it fogs up rather quickly within the first 10 minutes of me taking a warm shower to the point that it is now completely fogged up. This is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Have used it one time. Was nice to have a shaving mirror in the shower. It fell off my fiberglass shower stall overnight, but I had not followed their instructions about washing the surface with alcohol and drying it before applying the suction cup. Have done so now and it seems to be secure. A week later: amazing when one follows simple instructions! The mirror is firmly fastened to my wall by using a tad of Vaseline (as suggested) to the suction cup. Mirror remains for free. I’m enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup system is faulty and will not work
customer_reviews.text: THE WORST shower mirror I have ever owned! Will not stick at all. You think it’ll stick.... but every Morning since I’ve received this, i find it in the floor. It has broken two of my razors already, and the mirror will probably break shortly if I keep trying. I’ve tried glass and tile. It is a faulty system and you will hate every piece of this item. I cannot stress enough to not buy this item!!! Oh wait- didn’t notice but the mirror frame has already cracked from the multiple falls!
customer_reviews.author: mitch cohn

customer_reviews.title: Not Fogless For Us
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is decent, the suction cup sticks well on our shower wall, and the swivel mechanism works as described. Unfortunately, the mirror has fogged since the first day we installed it. In its defense, we take hot showers and the mirror is located in a spot where it never gets wet, so it may be that ANY mirror would fog up in those conditions. I haven't tried any others, so I don't know. I'm giving it three stars because everything else is fine, but deducting two because the anti-fog promise was the reason I actually ordered it. I'm disappointed, but it's too much hassle to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Bee

customer_reviews.title: I’ve already done the research. This is the One to Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This one Works! No fog, decent size & great suction mount with twist lock! There are two main reasons that this has over the competitors. 1. Great suction mount with a twist lock (unlike the other normal suction mount that always falls off at any time!) 2. This does not Fog up! No need to take off-fill with hot water-then re-attach it to the mount. Too many variables. 3. The frame & razor holder is all polycarbonate plastic, but seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Stay On The Wall
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay secured to the wall. I first tried to secure the suction device directly onto my marble wall - it fell off within an hour. I followed all the directions cleaning the wall with isopropyl alcohol and allowing the wall to dry. No go. The company sent me a round plastic disk to mount on the tile with a self adhesive backing. I again followed their instructions and mounted the mirror suction device to the wall plate. Fell off within three hours. I have now thrown the mirror in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Sarin

customer_reviews.title: Still Fogs up!
customer_reviews.text: The company should not be promoting that the product is "fogless."Very false advertisement. It was fogless for the first two days, after that it always fogs up, no matter if showered with low or no heat! If I wanted a product that fogged up, I would have bought a cheaper mirror to place in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still up after a month.....
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the investment. Easy to install. Orient it with the lighting you have in your shower. The only negative comments I have are: I have a very small shower so it sticks out a bit (4 inches) so it can swivel into different positions. I tend to hit it with my shoulder knocking the razor from the 'holder' that is part of the unit. Bit of a pain retrieving the razor it in a 'steaming shower. Also it will fog up but you can easily put some soap on it to retard the fogging. Don't imagine there is a truly fogless mirror for a shower. Didn't take a star away because my shower is really small. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Holding Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I have shaved in the shower for years without a mirror. Sometimes, just sometimes, I'd miss my mark and cut more than I should have. Because of that my wife bought this mirror so that would be a thing of the past. Okay, it's a mirror. It has a suction cup. If you can't figure out how to use it, do you really think the PDF file is likely to make a difference? I don't even think the person would be smart enough to use a computer if they can't use one suction cup on a mirror. It IS a mirror, it doesn't fog and it does hold up. What more do you really need to know?
customer_reviews.author: By CJs Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Good shower mirror for a better shave. Anti-fog?  must wipe water droplets prior to use
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but water droplets still form so wiping with a hand towel is necessary to see clearly. The suction would only hold for about 1 day so I purchased the flat mirror finish disc to stick to the wall and now the suction works perfect without worrying about breakage. The wall disc should be included in the package because no tile or fiberglass walls are completely flat and non-porous enough to form a long term suction bond - otherwise a perfectly good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold suction and broke into clear shards of plastic.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great until it didn’t. First, it does indeed fog but not that much compared to my previous mirror. Second, my previous mirror stayed on the wall for at least 5 years with no issue but this mirror lost suction and fell resulting in the breakage of the clear lip that holds the razor. The scary thing is that it broke like glass into several sharp, clear pieces in the shower that were almost impossible to see without getting down and closely inspecting the shower pan. These is no way anything you are putting into your shower should break like this.
customer_reviews.author: DVAB

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror if you don't expect it to stay on the wall
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice mirror that even when you follow the directions to the letter for installation will proceed to fall off the shower wall. It may be an immediate drop, or a nice five minute later drop, but it's going to drop. It is too heavy for the suction cup mounting.
customer_reviews.author: hannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and fogless so far
customer_reviews.text: My husband was ready to take the plunge and shave his balding head. He asked me to order him a mirror for the shower so he could attempt this scary feat. The day this mirror arrived, he went into the bathroom, showered, and exited the bathroom a smooth hairless man. So far the mirror hasn't fogged up and it is working well. Husband says he will be now shaving his face in the shower thanks to this mirror, which means less sink clean up for me! It also works well for applying purple shampoo on my blond hair...I can see where it's on my head now!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great Fogless Shower Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love a hot shower and shaving while I am in the shower. For decades I have used mirrors that I have to hold in the water stream to warm them up so they won't fog. The reflection of those mirrors was atrocious. This mirror is fantastic. Easy to mount and more if you need to relocate it. The reflection of the mirror is clear and helps shave those sensitive areas that require delicate handling. The seller provided a followup email shortly after my mirror was delivered with instructions on how to care and maintain the mirror. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shaving mirror, especially for the shower
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. It looks good, attaches w perhaps the most secure suction device (so it is still removable) and it does not fog. What more could I ask for in something like this? I have it suctioned to a wall tile and it is secure. In fact the company even provides you w an adhesive backed smooth front-surfaced pad that I did not need so I used that extra piece to keep a suction-cupped soap dish in place. Too bad the soap dish company couldn't learn from the shaving mirror folks. But all is well now!
customer_reviews.author: Wigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: the grip has gripped me
customer_reviews.text: Previous shower mirrors either had a poor mirror surface and/or frequently lost its grip. My wife and I came to know the sound in the middle of the night of the shower mirror falling to the tile floor. This item seems to have solved the problem. The grip appears, so far, excellent and the mirror good quality although I don't look any better. Excellent install instructions with the company seeming to give the customer the information she/he needs plus some suggestions if there are issues.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Not great at being fogless but sturdy and easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm glad I got this mirror because it's so easy to adjust between my husband and I at very different heights trying to see ourselves. I've never had a problem with it falling off. However, it lost its foglessness only after about a month of use. We were careful to obey instructions of not spraying water directly on it and using soapy water splashed on it if it fogged up but regardless it fogs very quickly after getting into the shower and always have to splash the soapy water on it if we want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two showers
customer_reviews.text: My first two (or three) shows the fogless worked. It was magical and great. Since then it's failed pretty much every time. Which isn't the biggest problem splash of water will make it go away and once the mirror is heated to whatever water temperature you are showering at it fogs less. (Kind of like how car windshield system works) The suction wasn't enough to stay on my tiles. To be fair the tile isn't enamel or glass it has grainy surface. It's pretty secure on my glass door though so that's nice.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a good shower mirror
customer_reviews.text: The tile walls in my shower have a bit of texture to them, so I was not able to use the suction cup feature on my tiles. However, I did check it on a couple of other smooth surfaces and the suction cup assembly does a good job of locking down. One thing I will mention for any in-shower mirror. Try to avoid wiping it with your fingers or washcloth, because that will inevitably lead to scratches. I just run some warm water over the mirrored surface and bring it up to temperature and it has worked just fine for me. The temperature difference is what causes the fogging. I would like to see this item priced a little lower.
customer_reviews.author: TrueBlue73

customer_reviews.title: requires minor maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: It was an easy install and worked great when I first installed it. The mirror was fog free and the suction was strong. As time goes on, the mirror began to fog up from the building up shampoo or soap getting splashed onto it. I eventually have to scrub the mirror down to clean it so that it doesn't fog up again. Also the suction does weaken over time. It's fallen off the wall a few times. Luckily nothing was cracked. Now, I check the suction and twist it tight once a month or so and it hasn't fallen since.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Louie

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Simply junk. They use a wrong polymer for the suction cup that does not adhere and then rather than fixing this send you directions on how to use this as though it’s different from every other one in the world. For years I’ve owned a different one pitched from Amazon by not longer available and thought this would be a good replacement. Wrong! The suction cup doesn’t hold even to flat and polished ceramic tile that is glazed smooth, and even though following their ridiculous directions. Most of these reviews have to be from Chinese bots or indentured servants hired to write positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: 605x3j14

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I've had this item for nearly 2 months and it is now fogging up on my daily shower for the last 3 weeks now. Spend your money elsewhere. When I first opened the box and read the instructions they were kinda confusing and hard to follow. The suction was amazing on my tiles in the shower (tile has to be big enough to fit the entire suction cup). It has been up for almost a week now and it is still holding up great on the tile. Honestly we haven't touched the mirror AT ALL and it's somehow getting foggy in certain areas (very small spots) so that didn't take long. Otherwise, love the rotating feature and size.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Replaced one of those mirrors that connects to the water with this much simpler mirror. The first week it wouldn't fog up at all and was super clear. After about a week it would start to fog up pretty quickly but by just flicking some water onto it with your hand as the manual says, fixed it right away. I like to shave in the shower and this is super useful. Am very happy with it. Received an email from the seller soon after ordering with a PDF of tips and instructions which was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Duda Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my husband!
customer_reviews.text: We had another one of these and loved it !! We bought a different brand when we moved into our apartment , it ruined the tile in the shower ! We just moved into our first home and my husband need another mirror as he likes to have in the shower ! He is talked it in seconds and loves it ! Superior product !
customer_reviews.author: Emily Baker

customer_reviews.title: Fogless mirror
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install and the directions were easy to follow. It is performed excellently for me since I’ve installed it. I do not live in the United States so it was shipped out of country and arrive two days earlier than promised. I’m in excess this product was easy to install and the directions were easy to follow. It is performed excellently for me since I’ve installed it. I do not live in the United States so it was shipped out of country and arrive two days earlier than promised. I’m very pleased with this product and would highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L. Poole

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've had many shaving mirrors over the years and they all have failed. This mirror lasted two weeks. Unfortunately, now this mirror fogs every time I take a shower. This shaving mirror features a tilting frame, however; it's not flush with the wall like all the others. This mirror only holds one razor, however; it's not wide enough to properly hold a cartridge razor. It does hold a safety razor, however; it's too narrow. As a result, it tilts. Overall impression: * Strong suction * Tilts on a pivot * Fogless mirror lasted two weeks * Low price * Terrible value Recommended: No
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: My Third purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this mirror. Compared to others, the suction holding the mirror in place is the best that I have found. I get about a year and a half use for the mirror and normally replace due to water spots on the mirror. I will purchase again as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bluestone

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many, many shower mirrors for my husband over the years, and so far (we've only had it for two weeks), this one is his favorite. It's a good size, is adjustable, and has not had any issues with suction or the mirror fogging up. He was just saying how much better his shaves have been. I will also add that it's an attractive mirror, and doesn't change the overall look of the shower. Will provide an update if things were to change, but at this point, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ChattyK

customer_reviews.title: best shpwer mirror ever !!!
customer_reviews.text: It really is that good. Doesn't fog and stays where it put it yet still removes easy. Tilts to any direction the average person would expect and packs in my back pack nice for taking to the Gym and using in their showers. I am very pleased with this after trying others and being disappointed. I shave head and face in shower and give this a two thumbs up rating (5 stars). Absolutely positively would buy it again !
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good ... with a caveat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shower mirror. The "lock-down" suction cup works great on glass. Only downside is that it does not grip tile if there is even the slightest texture to the tile. The description implies it only will not stick if tile is very textured, but our tile is smooth with a slight texture and it wouldn't gip no matter what. Luckily, we have a glass wall on one side, and that sucker holds on for dear life to glass! The anti fog coating really works. Just do not wipe the mirror!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Ernst

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t fog and the suction cup is very stout. That’s perfect for a shaving mirror in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted! The suction is really strong, and the mirror does not fog at all. Makes shaving in the shower enjoyable. It’s easy to adjust if you want it up or down or left or right, and did I mention how nice it is to have an unfoggy mirror? I highly recommend this if you enjoy trimming the daily whiskers in the shower. I had a minor issue which required contacting the seller and I was absolutely stunned at the fast turnaround and the solving of my problem. You cannot go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Skyspy

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup and razor holder work
customer_reviews.text: The reason for the purchase was to be able to shave in the shower. The suction cup and razor holder work. But if you need a mirror that works in the shower you are out of luck. Fogged immediately and every time. Fortunately I use a safety razor or otherwise harakiri, further up my torso. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bresenhan

customer_reviews.title: and form is great too. For me
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly picked about my product purchases. When I make a purchase, function is most important, form is also important, second to function. This product's function perfectly matches my expectations, and form is great too. For me, this mirror is perfect for shaving in the shower. The cost was honestly a little more than I expected to spend, but now that I have the mirror and had a chance to use to for 1.5 weeks, I'm glad I choose this product. I recommend this product to anyone needing a mirror to shave in the shower. No fog, mounts easy, attaches firmly, swivel position adjustment works great. Seems to be built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not Fogless for long
customer_reviews.text: It seems none of the shower mirrors ever stay fogless very long and this one is no different. Maybe had 3-5 showers where it did not fog up and then it just started fogging up all the time. Back to putting soap on it to keep it from fogging. So good part is the suction cup works well and it stays on the wall without falling off. Negative is fogless is just not true, or at least not for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Randal H.

customer_reviews.title: Fogless....really?
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is NOT a fogless mirror. It fogs up every time my husband tries to shave in the shower. The suction to the wall is good but he has to apply water and soap to the mirror to keep the fog off. The old one he had was better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shih Tzu Mom

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: You don't move it once it's set, so suction keeps it on the wall. If you have to adjust this a lot for different users, it might not stay as well on the wall. I've set it for just me and it hasn't moved for weeks. I have a shower head on a hose, so if it gets fogged (not very often) a quick spray or hand splash of water clears the mirror. Clean close shave that only can be had in a steamy shower...would be again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Starts off strong but disappointing when it didn’t remain fogless.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror to replace a smaller mirror. It really comes in handy and I’ve had no problems keeping it fixed to the shower. Update 2020: This mirror Started off great and worked perfectly. However it has been a few months and it is no longer fogless. I’m no expert, but am guessing that there was a spray that kept the mirror fogless and may have worn off or It may just be defective. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Foggs like all mirrors in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: For the first couple weeks, it stayed fogless. Gradually over time, it fogged up just like all other mirrors. Even when I clean it with a mild soap with my fingers, it still foggs up. Don’t be fooled, it’s no different than any other mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick to wall
customer_reviews.text: Another amazon scam product. Reviews have to be fake. There is no way, from an engineering standpoint, that this would actually stick and lock. "Advanced suction cup design " is apparantly synonymous with broken and poorly implemented. No idea if mirror fogs or not, it wont stick to my perfectly clean and flat standard fiberglass shower wall. Thanks for giving me the errand of returning this to the ups store.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roll

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Great things... Razor holder, nice and handy. Less stuff to stack on a bath rack. Reflective quality. Sharp, distortioness. Suction cup mount. Sturdy, flexible Good things... Fogless, not entirely, but at the opposite end of my tub away from the showerhead, and me not using a lot of hot water, it is adequate. I can squeegee it about 90% Bad things... None!
customer_reviews.author: montressor7

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it has fogged up everytime I've used it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mirror several weeks ago because of the many reviews that said it did not fog up in the shower. The suction feature is totally awesome and it has stayed securely in every location I've put it. I've moved it around in the shower hoping a different location would solve the fogging problem. Unfortunately it has fogged up every time I've used it. It's no better than a shower mirror you can pickup at the dollar store. What's the point of having a mirror in the shower to shave with if you can't see yourself? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this based upon reviews, however, I’m very skeptical about those reviews because this worked exactly one shower. I was elated that finally after having tried about half a dozen fog less mirrors over the years that finally one actually worked as advertised. That didn’t last...very next day...foggy mirror. It’s a descent mirror and is nice that it pivots, but it is NOT a fog-less mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C

customer_reviews.title: Fogless and mounts securely
customer_reviews.text: It took me a few minutes to understand exactly how I needed to mount it to the shower wall but once I understood and followed the instructions, it works GREAT! I love it! and it truly is fogless too! AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT "fogless" at all
customer_reviews.text: It's not even a little bit fog free. It literally fogs up almost immediately. I wipe it with a towel, shave the best I can for a few seconds, wipe it with a towel again, shave for a few seconds, repeat x1000.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This was a little more money than I wanted to spend on a shaving mirror but I’m glad I did. My old mirror kept falling off the wall and always fogged up. This one sticks great to the shower wall with the quality locking suction cup (I followed the instructions to clean the surface first that I was sticking it to) and it is truly anti-fog. The mirror is a nice size too. This is a quality product and well worth the investment. I’m sure it will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Schluter

customer_reviews.title: Great value, clear image
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value and I'm happy with the purchase. It's a great shaving mirror left in the shower stall. It tilts to different angles, something my previous shaving mirrors didn't do. It is not a magnified mirror in case you're wondering. It is a standard mirror with true image. The suction works well-some of mine have fallen in the shower and this one has not. It is large enough to see full face in the mirror. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe A. Talerico

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I get one of these sooner?
customer_reviews.text: This mirror has mad shaving in the shower a pleasure. It is non-fogging, but my glasses aren't, so the extra clarity is much appreciated. The suction works great. As a notorious under-tightener, the mirror wasn't securely fastened until I heard a positive click. That's my error. What I learned from that is that the mirror could be dropped without breaking. Since I mounted it correctly it has been in place for months. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jurgen Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Not as Fogless as it claims
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the hubby for Christmas. First time he used it, seemed fine. After a couple of weeks it will fog up pretty regularly. If you are looking for a super clear fogless mirror this is not the product for you. If you just want a mirror that sticks pretty good to your tile shower and holds your razor, this would probably work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mom_of_4_kiddos

customer_reviews.title: Performed as adevertised
customer_reviews.text: It is truly fogless. I was skeptical but when the glass panel it is attached to is totally fogged the mirror stays clear. I do wish it didn't stick our as far as it does from the glass panel it is attached to as it hit it with my arm a couple of times. However i have learned to live with the slightly reduced area in the stall. When I did hit it with my arm it stayed connected to the glass no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin H. Scott

customer_reviews.title: works as indicated
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it a short time, but it easily attached to the smooth shower surround and has stayed there. I very much like the little ears that poke out at the bottom to store the razor and the ball joint stem that allows excellent adjustment. They included a sticky plastic pad with a smooth surface for situations where the surround has a rough or uneven surface.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Ciarrochi

customer_reviews.title: Mounting seems very secure so far
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old shaving mirror with this one because the old one was delaminating and not staying stuck to the tile in my shower. All indications are that the mounting system on this one is more sophisticated and should hold up better. The mirror itself appears to be of good quality, so I'm looking forward to many years of satisfaction with this product.
customer_reviews.author: M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Mirror
customer_reviews.text: This mirror sticks well to our glass shower wall. The suction cup has a twisting mechanism that makes it stick really well. Just put it on when the glass is dry and not all fogged up. Ours has fogged up some, but only if you have been in the shower a really long time. It tilts well so you can position it where you need to. It is inexpensive and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to mount.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror. Easy to mount with just a twist. Falls off once in a while, but doesn't break. Stays mostly fog free and holds my razor. Best shower mirror I've owned in 20+ years of buying shower mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Proshooter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror, wont attach to my tile
customer_reviews.text: I have only just begun to use this mirror, so time will tell on durability. The instructions were straightforward and easy. The suction cup works great on glass, however I can not get it to seal and grip on my tile. Which is where I really want it. I tried all the suggestions in the instructions and watched some videos. However it just will not stick to the tile. For that reason I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, mine stayed fog free for about 2 weeks, then started fogging. That said, I just splash water on it and it stays fog free for plenty of time for me to shave. So, good enough and I don’t have to fill a water reservoir. Suction cup is awesome. Set it and forget it and no issues after a month. I also like the razor hanging feature.
customer_reviews.author: F. Garner

customer_reviews.title: NOT fogless! Good mirror, though
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mirror, but it is not fogless, as the name claims. It does stick well to the wall of the shower, and I like the razor holder. However, the second the steam hits the mirror, you have to wipe it off constantly or spray it with water. I'm giving this mirror three stars only because it doesn't do what it claims to.
customer_reviews.author: N & J

customer_reviews.title: A must buy! I bought one for each shower
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made mirror. The mirror gives a crystal clear reflection and here's a tip: yes, it will fog up in a hot shower by the second week, take a drop of shampoo in your hand and add water; toss that combo onto the mirror and it will stay fog-free for the remainder of the shower. Unbelievable service: the suction on this is second to none. But for some weird and unknown reason, the part that holds the razor broke off. I contacted the seller and they are shipping me a brand new one. So, buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Loses suction
customer_reviews.text: The "fogless" part of the description is not too bad. I've had this for about six weeks now and it hasn't fogged up at all. The problem with the mirror, however, is the suction cup. Three times now in the past week it has fallen off the shower wall in the middle of the night—only to wake us up and scare the crap out of us. The suction cup is on a totally flat, clean tile surface, but after a few days it simply loses suction and falls off. Not super happy with the purchase—would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: T. LeCarner

customer_reviews.title: It stays on the wall!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several shower mirrors but none as good as this mirror. Yes. It is fogless but the best feature is the turn-and-lock suction that holds it on the shower wall. It's very sturdy and so far hasn't fallen off. This is the trouble I've had with every other shower mirror- eventually, they take a dive and break in the bottom of my tub. I don't think that will ever happen with this one. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Delbert Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this has been a great investment. Shaving in the shower has changed my shave completely! The mirror adjusts well and easily, and it was very quick and easy to install. I've had it for a few weeks now and haven't had any issues with it falling off. I wiped it down once, which did seem to affect the "fogless" feature a little bit. However, it still doesn't fog up, only gets wet from the steam more than it used to, but it hasn't affected the visibility any. It also has a handy spot to store your razor. It does it well enough that I haven't stepped on my razor yet, so that's good, right?! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for beard-shaving in the shower
customer_reviews.text: This mirror has a clean design, is large enough to see your entire face at once, is bright and clear, and just a splash of water on the mirror is the most you'll need for clear visibility in even the steamiest shower enclosure. I made my purchase following a long search to replace a mirror I'd been using ~20 years. There's an awful lot of junk out there in this product category. This mirror has proven to be good value for money and I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: alligatorpig

customer_reviews.title: Would not stay adhered
customer_reviews.text: While the fog-less functionality worked well, the mirror would not stay adhered to our tile for more than a day or two. This was a gift, so even though I've had it for over a month, we've only been using it for a few weeks. It has fallen three times and the last time, it broke. I would not recommend this for the price, if you have to use the locking suction cup feature.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Snelgrove

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay fogless!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror has good suction and holds my razor, but does not stay fogless for more than 2 weeks. I cleaned per the instructions, but it still did not stay fogless for more than 3 days after the initial 2 weeks. Very disappointed, was looking forward to this saving me time shaving. If you have to clean it before EVERY shower were is the convenience or time savings in that.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Followed the easy instructions and had it up in no time. The suction power will not allow the mirror to fall and the hook for the razor keeps it handy. I have used it several times now and it has not come close to fogging up. I don't write a lot of reviews but had to for this product. 5 Stars and I HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. D

customer_reviews.title: Great product-Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I was a little skeptical about it staying up at first but the company (Red Apples) emailed me with proper instructions on how to hang it up. It’s been about a week since I put it up and its still holding on pretty well! And the mirror really doesn’t even fog!! (And if it starts to, they’ll let you know how to clean it or handle it. They have been super helpful and professional!)
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Its is going to fog!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just remodeled my master bath and I always shave in the shower. My tiles on the shower is slightly porous and would not stick till I applied the round plastic attachment. Now the mirror sticks great and had no problem with it staying put. I took extra precautions NOT to touch the mirror with my hands but after 5 showers the mirror is unusable because of it fogging up. I just read the PDF attachment of this email and will be trying the shampoo trick. I replaced my original mirror because I had to soap it down every time I used it and hoped this mirror was different.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great; but I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Lightweight, Clear good mirror image, stays fog free provided I don’t keep hot water on for long which I don’t usually do, good price and arrived quickly and in perfect condition. You may not like this one if you shave while taking long and hot showers, as it does fog up pretty quickly. Also, mirror image is not magnified. Neither of those two things bug me, but they might bug you. I use a shower caddy hanging from the shower spigot and just arrange the mirror appropriately on that, so I didn’t attach suction gizmo, and so cannot comment on that feature. I’d buy again given my simple needs and good price.
customer_reviews.author: RG in WA

customer_reviews.title: Does Its Job Well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror for a few reasons. 1.) The sticky part/adhesive sticks and you can actually lock it in there, in the month we've had it up in the shower it hasn't fallen once. 2.) It's very movable so you can push it off to the side and swivel it out when you need to use it. The four stars is because it does fog up sadly after the first use, but wiping it once with your hand will keep it pretty cleared up for the rest of the shower :) For the price and how convenient and well it worked, I would reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: KMasi

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I like to shave during my morning shower and over the years have used several mirrors. Some were good and some were a waste of money. This particular mirror by ProBeautify Mirror Co. is the best I have used. It actually stays attached to the wall. It does not fog and has a sharp image. Very good value and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior product, forget the anti fog thing
customer_reviews.text: Really a great mirror. Superior suction power. As far as anti-fog, no mirror has real great anti-fog mechanisms. I take a little bit of shampoo and scrub it into my hands and wipe the mirror with it, throw some water on it. This prevents all fogging for hours. That’s my anti-fog. The mirror is really great and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alian G. Garay

customer_reviews.title: Had to change my rating ....
customer_reviews.text: Updating ordered for Xmas . I don't know what happened but it's starting to FOG up on me.... Really is a great shower mirror. Got it for my husband for Christmas and it does exactly what it says.. Suction is strong. You can angle the mirror and I use it when I'm washing face. He hangs his razor on it and that's it.... Great price for a great mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Kott

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fog and stays on the wall. My only problem is that the razor holder drops my razor if I'm not really careful. I've used stand alone razor holders that worked much better. update:After having it a few months it fogs like crazy no matter what I do. Also it falls off the side of the shower every couple of months. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: doubleganger

customer_reviews.title: Where is customer service?
customer_reviews.text: This mirror kept falling down! I followed directions exactly but the suction didn't work. Finally the mirror broke. I contacted customer service without any response. I really wanted this to work out. The lack of customer service really killed it for me. I just ended up with a broken mirror that doesn't suction.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaGirl

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: Got this shower mirror for my self. And it works and the section cup make it easy to Install and it stay where you put it. just remember to twist the section cup locking nut. so it will stay on the shower wall. and remember to wet the action cup a little before you put on the wall. The other nice thing about the item is it's easy to take down of you want to move it to a different spot on the wall. And it does not fog up. If you looking for a good shower mirror at a good price you may want to pick this one up.
customer_reviews.author: Amzon Comsuter

customer_reviews.title: Fogless ??
customer_reviews.text: Be careful of the vernacular being used here. "Fogless" is not fog free. This mirror has less fog than other mirrors or, maybe not. I've had this mirror for 6 months. As long as there is no steam in your shower, THEN, you can see your face. I'll try another brand because this one is not working up to it's reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Franzie

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Stay on Wall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping I could use this in my shower. It sticks to the wall for a few minutes and then falls. I tried several different location and it never stuck. After about 10++ fall it cracked and I sent it back. Not worth the headache of packing it up and having to return it. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henshaw

customer_reviews.title: fogless mirror
customer_reviews.text: First installation was fast and easy. It's been subjected to 4 showers and there has been no problem with movement and no fogging. I don't take steamy showers. The reflective surface gives a clear image. Delivery was fast. There was a question about security features... as far as i know there is no problems with security (no hidden cameras). Just kidding.
customer_reviews.author: 4MER2THDR

customer_reviews.title: Updated-- falls continuously
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave a good review of this mirror as it worked well. However after about 6 weeks it fell. I cleaned the tile and the suction cup and put it back up and now it falls every few days. I don't hang anything on it. It can't support its own weight. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Mirror, Mirror, not on the wal
customer_reviews.text: Mirror, Mirror, not on the wall You are the lamest of them all I bought you with hopes that you'd suck But you continue to fall and hit my rubber duck I don't want to see my toes It'd be helpful if I could focus on my nose Stay away from this dropping reflector It's almost as thought it possed by a spectre
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mirror for me
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror! I use it when I cut my own hair, it's light to hold, and I can securely suction it to my wall mirror so my hands are free. I highly recommend this mirror :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the mirror it’s in my shower did what it said it would do no fog which is awesome, it came with a clear circle to use if your wall if it is not a smooth Surface work like a charm the only thing is I wish it had two of those circles to move the mirror around my husband is taller so one of us really can’t use the mirror but a awesome product I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rejmaniak

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through three of these shower mirrors and this is definitely the best of the bunch but it does scratch quite easily with bare hands. That has been the issue with the others as well but they became unusable after a short amount of time due to the scratch and loss of mirror reflection.
customer_reviews.author: MindblowingSports

customer_reviews.title: Terrible materials
customer_reviews.text: Immediately the mirror had a haze from a coating on the plastic mirror. A coating that does not come off without ruining the mirror. It lasted 2 nights and it was no longer wanted. It is on the far end of the shower, it doesn't even get wet and it still got ruined. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: ed gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: No Fog and Light weight
customer_reviews.text: This little fogless mirror is well made and light weight for the shower and that helps to secure the suction lock cup. It was very easy to install and the magnification is not too much and so I get a clear view when I shave in the shower. Thanks I like it. Do you have other sizes or larger ones?
customer_reviews.author: srinspector

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Others have said the same thing in their review, but it bears repeating. The suction cup device on this unit is the best that I have seen on any shower accessory. This thing is stuck to the wall like there is adhesive on it! However, a quick turn of the suction cup lever and it releases easily for cleaning. The mirror is holding up well. No fog and it cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoJim

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Clear and bright. Attached easily to shower stall wall. Did not need the provided accessories. I have noticed some fogging but a little water on it clears that up so I can shave. Part of that issue may be attributable to two teenage daughters that used that small shower for a few days. That is when I noticed the change. They both have long hair and perhaps some shampoo or conditioner got splashed on it. Regardless I have no trouble using it and would buy it again along with recommending to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mirror works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is awesome. Just what I was looking for. And to those who say it’s not anti fog, it is. If it fogs a little bit bit I just put some warm water over it and rub some Bar soap over it and it’s fine. So don’t listen to the negative “it’s not anti fog” it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best fogless mirror out there
customer_reviews.text: I have never been satisfied with any of the fogless mirrors that I paid too much money for at Bad, Bath and Beyond. They either fogged up before I finished shaving or lost suction and shattered on the shower floor. This mirror has not fogged up once in my 3 weeks of use, and stays snuggly on my shower wall. Fantastic product at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Reich

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it. The mirror will fog up over time but cleaning it with soap and water regularly will help. Also if it does fog just splash some hot water on It and it’ll suffice. Must have a flat surface to suction to. Will not work on tile or shower walls with ridges in them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G.

customer_reviews.title: A fine looking man in my shower
customer_reviews.text: Great Mirror. It doesn't fog up and it was so easy to install. I was able to shave in the shower using this very mirror. It saves a lot of time and makes me look more like a handsome man and not like some gross neckbeard. Looking better has improved myself esteem and I joined tinder. I have several matches and I am hoping to go on an actual date after the lockdown is lifted. It has been a long time since I have felt the touch of another person. SO SO long.... Anyway, it's a great mirror and I suggest you give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper D.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very good suction on the mirror. I enjoy how the suction cup is made by twisting the base of the mirror. The mirror works great in the shower. No fog has appeared on the mirror during hot showers.
customer_reviews.author: Corpsegrinder

customer_reviews.title: Just OK mirror. Suction doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I like this shaving mirror. Easy to hang. I was worried about the hanging due to some of the negative reviews, but I had no problems with the suction cup working. Just follow the instructions and it should stick to your wall fine (including making sure your wall material/surface is ok) Haven’t had any fogging issues yet. Update - OK it’s been a month and the auction finally gave out. Came home and found the mirror had fallen and the piece that holds the razor had chipped off 😔 Other then that I haven’t had any problems with fogging. If only the suction stayed suction longer then a month
customer_reviews.author: Adam Seth Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Fogless mirror that fogs up
customer_reviews.text: I know this product has good reviews but my mirror fogs up almost immediately. As far as mirrors go, it has great suction and it reflects my image accurately but I'm constantly wiping the fog from the mirror as I shave. Maybe I got a defective item but it isn't fogless for me.
customer_reviews.author: WE

customer_reviews.title: The mirror does do the job it was made for.
customer_reviews.text: The mirror will fog up, but if you spray water on it , it will clear and gives plenty of time to shave with a clear reflection.
customer_reviews.author: jack wilson

customer_reviews.title: Suction cup is trash
customer_reviews.text: If you have a ceramic tile shower cabin (like most people) this won't work. Tried attaching the suction cup according to instructions on my cleaned and dried tile surface, making sure to apply pressure and fully screw in the lock. The mirror sits firmly and you can articulate it without the suction cup flexing....for about 5 minutes, after which it loses the vacuum and falls off. I repeated this several times until the mirror fell for the last time and broke the flimsy transparent plastic cladding. My tiles aren't even especially glossy, but this couldn't hold on no matter what. Let's see if I can get a refund...
customer_reviews.author: Lyuben Kraev
